emails.body_text:
Hello Omar,

 

Following up on my previous email, @Pablo Figueroa <mailto:pablo.figueroa@dnext.io>  will also be joining us. However, the session time will need to be adjusted to 12:00 PM Geneva time.

 

I’ll send the updated Teams invitation shortly.

 

Please don’t hesitate to let me know if you have any questions or need any further assistance.

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>

info@dnext.io <mailto:info@dnext.io>  | www.dnext.io <http://www.dnext.io/>

Thank you for your message.

 

At this stage, an analyst is not scheduled to join the session. I’ll check their availability and update you as soon as possible.

Best regards,
